awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3) BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; AND 4) BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES AND CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF WATER QUALITY AND CLIMATE CHANGE; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION PROGRAM; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; AND SUPPORTING KENAI WATERSHED'S SURFACE WATER QUALITY MONITORING PROJECT.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.  ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; FINANCIAL REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; AND EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS.

PROJECT TITLE: KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING FY 2024 :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL TRANSPORTATION FUNDING PROVIDED BY FHWA TO KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE UNDER THE FHWA OTT PROGRAM AGREEMENT FOR FY24

PROJECT TITLE: KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING FY 2024 :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL TRANSPORTATION FUNDING PROVIDED BY FHWA TO KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE UNDER THE FHWA OTT PROGRAM AGREEMENT FOR FY24
PROJECT TITLE: KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE FY2025 TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL FY25 FUNDS TRANSFERRED TO KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE UNDER REFERENCED FUNDING AGREEMENTS.
PROJECT TITLE: KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE FY2025 TRIBAL TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL FY25 FUNDS TRANSFERRED TO KENAITZE INDIAN TRIBE UNDER REFERENCED FUNDING AGREEMENTS.
